name: Bricks Ball Crusher
description:
Welcome to The Bricks Ball Crusher! We come back with more new content!

The Bricks Ball Crusher is a classic and exciting brick game. Just play this game to relax your brain and get fun. The game is funny and challenging.
Just touch at the screen and shoot your physics balls and break the bricks.
Please remember you must break as many balls as possible to get the highest scores and pass the levels.
We have provided many props to help you to pass the level.

we believe that you will fall in love with this game!
Features:
1. Free to play
2. Smooth control
3. 1000+ levels
4. wonderful physics experience
5. 10+ balls and so many different bricks
6. you can play without wifi.
7. subscription options.
Just download and play it with other friends in the world.
